name: I am Ghost
description:
You play as a robot that is made to steal documents with the ability to walk through walls, you have to watch out for the security or you'll have to restart the level.  There are  10 levels at the moment but I'm adding more in the future. I'm going to add more game modes but at the moment there is normal and speed run mode, I'm soon adding dark mode and no gun mode.

The game is a bit quiet so you may want to turn your volume up.

Controls- The game assumes you have a bit of fps experience but if you don't the controls are,

W- Forward 

A- Left

D- Right

S- Backwards 

Mouse- Look

L Click- Shoot

R Click- Aim

Shift- Sprint 

Ctrl- Crouch 

E- Break the laws of physics
